ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Webber, Jessica  ... Oh I knew you meant that. It s a totally lame reward for that delivery. Especially since Qeynos is someplace
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>


> > > Maybe it was 8 gold or so but they were concerned that
> > teleporting classes
> > > could use the quest to get rich quick?
> >
> > Think about it, the fastest way to do this would be a Wizard
> > (with JBoots)
> > porting to West Karana, or maybe a druid porting from North Karana
> > considering high level SoW or Scale of Wolf sould toast
> > JBoots. Even at that
> > it's several minutes for 8gold and faction, I imagine not a
> > lot of mail will
> > be flowing along that route.
>
> Heh, guess I should have included "</sarcasm>" :-)

Oh I knew you meant that. It's a totally lame reward for that delivery.
Especially since Qeynos is someplace you don't visit much when you get to
the level that can operate in Kunark. What's over in that region? Kerra
Island? Paneel? The Hole soon? Certainly there's little reason for someone
to leave Kunark and head for Qeynos too often.

Reedwind
